title: Modern Songbook
summary: Beautifuly designed songbook for musical instrument players and singers.
description: Try this wonderful songbook out and you will never want to use a paper one again! You can download songs with chords from three different sources or add your own. Enjoy viewing lyrics with cover artwork in eye pleasing Material design. App is add free.Key features:  • Material design • Get your favorite songs from internet or import them • Set and save your own scrolling speed in different parts of a song • Automatic text formatting and advanced chords expansion to all strophes for much better readability • Build in metronome • Find song on YouTube by one tap • Supports Android Wear!
descriptionHTML:
Try this wonderful songbook out and you will never want to use a paper one again! You can download songs with chords from three different sources or add your own. Enjoy viewing lyrics with cover artwork in eye pleasing Material design. App is add free.

Key features:

• Material design
• Get your favorite songs from internet or import them
• Set and save your own scrolling speed in different parts of a song
• Automatic text formatting and advanced chords expansion to all strophes for much better readability
• Build in metronome
• Find song on YouTube by one tap
• Supports Android Wear!
comments: Cannot search and add songs from the web!
Neat I like it. I have one suggestion... being able to adjust the whole song key by half steps would be great.
recentChanges: Please send your comments, feature requests or bug reports to: ondrej.komarek.cz@gmail.com
